articles.author: Sana Noor Haq, CNN
articles.title: Coach dives into pool to rescue American swimmer Anita Alvarez at World Championships - CNN
articles.description: American swimmer Anita Alvarez was rescued from the bottom of the pool by her coach at the FINA World Aquatic Championships in Budapest, Hungary, after she lost consciousness, according to Reuters.
articles.content: (CNN)American swimmer Anita Alvarez was rescued from the bottom of the pool by her coach at the FINA World Aquatic Championships in Budapest, Hungary, after she lost consciousness, according to Reute… [+3192 chars]
